summary: This module implements a provider that scans AWS CloudFormation templates to locate and collect container image references from supported AWS resource definitions. It offers a class that orchestrates the extraction process and includes helper routines for parsing specific resource types such as AppRunner services, Batch job definitions, CodeBuild projects, ECS task definitions, Lightsail container deployments, and SageMaker models.
business_intent: Facilitate security and compliance checks by identifying all container images declared in CloudFormation stacks, enabling downstream scanning and policy enforcement for infrastructure-as-code deployments on AWS.
